info.title: Global Tongue API Documentation
info.description: Heirarchy of API | Courses -> Levels -> Units -> Lessons -> Exercises

get.description: Get list of conversations associated with a specific Parents

200.description: Conversations for the specified Parents ID

404.description: No Conversations found for the specified Parents ID

description.example: Here are the biggest enterprise technology acquisitions of 2021 so far, in reverse chronological order.
Here are the biggest enterprise technology acquisitions of 2021 so far, in reverse chronological order.

get.description: Get list of exercises associated with a specific Parents

200.description: Exercises for the specified Parents ID

404.description: No Exercises found for the specified Parents ID

get.description: Get list of lessons associated with a specific unit

200.description: Lessons for the specified Unit ID

404.description: No Lessons found for the specified Unit ID

description.example: Learn words and phrases for greetings and introductions, eating at a restaurant, shopping, family, and travel. Study professions, hobbies, pronunciation of -r versus -rr, and subject pronouns and learn when to use tú versus usted.

get.description: Get list of levels associated with a specific course

200.description: Levels for the specified Course ID

404.description: No Levels found for the specified Course ID

description.example: Learn words and phrases for greetings and introductions, eating at a restaurant, shopping, family, and travel. Study professions, hobbies, pronunciation of -r versus -rr, and subject pronouns and learn when to use tú versus usted.
